message: Hi Bob, I'm interested in selling you this product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a valuable item at a reasonable price. I'm willing to sell it to you for $95.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I would like to propose a lower price of $85. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Hi Bob, I understand that you're looking to save some money, but I'm not willing to go as low as $85. I can meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $90. It's a fair price considering the value of the product and I think you'll be happy with the deal.
